snippet: Young people were just as shallow 100 years ago, according to this David Pinski work, presented by the New Worlds Theater Project.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews New Worlds Theater Project production of  David Pinski play Professor Brenner, directed by Paul Takacs and starring David Greenspan and Makaela Shealy, at Here.
lead_paragraph: Young people were just as shallow 100 years ago, according to this David Pinski work, presented by the New Worlds Theater Project.

headline.main: Review: ‘Professor Brenner,’ a 1911 Play About a Generation Gap
